scripts.start: npm run docs && DEBUG=*routes*,*Service*,*Model*,FATAL nodemon keystone.js
scripts.postinstall: npm install apidoc -g && cp cheats/cloudinaryResize.js node_modules/keystone/admin/client/utils && cp cheats/CloudinaryImagesField.js node_modules/keystone/fields/types/cloudinaryimages && cp cheats/CloudinaryImageField.js node_modules/keystone/fields/types/cloudinaryimage && cp -f ./public/images/newspaper.png ./node_modules/keystone/admin/public/images/logo.png && cp -f cheats/Brand.js node_modules/keystone/admin/client/Signin/components/Brand.js
